Articles.Content: That's some great work!

Re-done Secunda! Now with 150% more pluto style.

Space Engine Render
I know you said you were going to add the terran like planet to n3 - have you already designed your layout for n2 and n3 then?

I know you said you were going to add the terran like planet to n3 - have you already designed your layout for n2 and n3 then?

I travel a lot on holidays, so I have time to plan the systems (But not to do them)

n2 is a system with 7 planets (4 are giants and 1 is a sub-giant) with high eccentric orbits.

n3 has no giants, but its planets are bigger than Kerbin (Except one)

I also have a triple star system designed that could be n2.
a0.3 update coming in Ã¢â€°Â¤7 days!

0.3 UPDATE!

  • Changed every planet and moons (Except C2-1 and C3-1) size to it's double.
  • Removed pixelated style surface to every body except C3-1.
  • Made Prima and Secunda binary. (Still WIP)
  • Secunda now resembles Pluto.
  • Changed Pequar rings. Now it doesn't have a gap and are yellow.
  • Applied an atmosphere to Pequar.
  • Changed C2-1, Disole, Kevari, Crons and Niko orbits for the more realistic feel.
  • Added a ringed crater to Niko
  • Added a mountain range to Disole, also, its texture will be changed in the next update.
  • Now Kopernicus isn't in the download, and 0.2.3/4 is required, although you can play with Kopernicus 0.3.1 with this fix (Place it in GameData/OtherWorlds/CercaniSystem/Pequar)

Edited August 26, 2015 by Pkmniako

Now Kopernicus isn't in the download, and 0.2.3/4 is required.

Didn't you update this with Kopernicus 0.3.1 in mind?

Didn't you update this with Kopernicus 0.3.1 in mind?

Just remembered when I was uploading the mod, but because I'm not having the computer in 1 or 2 days, and being my uploading speed pretty low, I decided to do a little version for Kopernicus 0.3.1.
oh ok, I can understand that

Fix for Kopernicus 0.3.1 https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B76UBLqbQb_9cm1ubWUzZFhjVGc

Place it on GameData/OtherWorlds/CercaniSystem/Pequar

"Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Interstellar/Alcubierre drive are mandatory to get to Cercani!"

Mandatory you say, . I was able to reach it without the help of any warp drives, granted it took well over 1000 years, and the time warp unlocker mod, and a bit of waiting, but I was able to make it in the endurance space craft mod.

I had it parked over Pequar before the kraken ate every ship in orbit and left merely a ranger on the surface

I like it so far. But can you post some surface shots? Also, what is the memory impact? I'm quite tight on memory.

DO you have a config for FAR? You need to set viscosity of atmospheres for it.

Is there an EVE cloud config?

Edited August 30, 2015 by .50calBMg

• Interstellar/Alcubierre drive are mandatory to get to Cercani!

You you mean you don't think it's viable to get enough DV together or that the code literally won't allow it without those? If it's the former I might just take that challenge

• Interstellar/Alcubierre drive are mandatory to get to Cercani!

You you mean you don't think it's viable to get enough DV together or that the code literally won't allow it without those? If it's the former I might just take that challenge

You can go in the classical way like Unicorn, but It's for not being a lot of time going to the system.

"Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Interstellar/Alcubierre drive are mandatory to get to Cercani!"

Mandatory you say, . I was able to reach it without the help of any warp drives, granted it took well over 1000 years, and the time warp unlocker mod, and a bit of waiting, but I was able to make it in the endurance space craft mod.

I had it parked over Pequar before the kraken ate every ship in orbit and left merely a ranger on the surface

Ok, I'm changing the sentence to something more accurate.

I like it so far. But can you post some surface shots? Also, what is the memory impact? I'm quite tight on memory.

DO you have a config for FAR? You need to set viscosity of atmospheres for it.

About ~100 MB, although I didn't test it. And about FAR, I don't have it in mind to do it, but I'm adding it to my TO-DO list.

Is there an EVE cloud config?

Under the Kerbal Stuff download.
Thanks
The EVE link just gives me a blank page.

Update! a0.3.1

  • Changed Disole texture and heightmap
  • Added biomes for all bodies (No science defs)
  • Removed mountain range of Disole.
I changed oxygen=true on Vassa to true, but jet engines still don't work.
Wow, really cool mod! It's very stockalike, and very interesting. Downloading right now. Good luck on further development!

I changed oxygen=true on Vassa to true, but jet engines still don't work.

There are two oxygen=false, change both or remove 1

Wow, really cool mod! It's very stockalike, and very interesting. Downloading right now. Good luck on further development!

ehrmm guys little problem here...

when I enter any saved game (or create a new one) the KSC doesn't appear, just a black screen...

At first I thought it was because of an incompatibility with my ton of mods but then, when I removed them and updated Kopernicus and MM, nothing changed...

Is it a known issue that I simply haven't seen?

P.S.Should I put this in the development thread?
